name: Dwarven Brawl Bros
description: Dwarven Brawl Bros is a local 2 to 6 player 2D fighting (brawling) game with a retroish feel. Play as a dwarf and kill your bros! Fast-paced brawling in all-vs-all and team settings with 31 weapons, 38 stages, 26 game modes!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Anything post 2010 (older processors might work as well!) Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Anything post 2010 (Anything with shader model 3) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: You better have one Additional Notes: Will most likely run just fine on any post-2010 configuration

reviews.review_text: Very funny game ! Amazing !   A lot of gameplays, not all are really fun but some of them will give you many hours of laughting !  Very nice that we can play to 6 players !

A great couch game that delivers a lot of fun when played together with friends. It's plain and simple fighting but what makes it fun is that it's based solely on the skills of the player. There is no RNG to blame for bad luck (unless the fight goes on too long).  It's become more and more balanced with each update. There are no OP weapons that would work in every situation. You have to choose between ranged and melee depending on the situation. There's plenty of different levels and the variation in their layouts is good. The slowmo kills are awesome :) .  There's not a lot of cons now that the game's been refined through updates. Could maybe use some more content like differently themed levels and some additional music but there's nothing to complain about the gameplay itself.
